title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course covers the fundamentals of C programming language. You will learn about variables, data types, control structures, functions, and more. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refresh your C programming skills, this course is for you.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore essential algorithms and their applications in this comprehensive course. You will delve into sorting algorithms, searching algorithms, graph algorithms, and dynamic programming. Gain the problem-solving skills you need for various domains.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ for data structures and algorithms (DSA). This course will teach you C++ programming while focusing on DSA concepts like arrays, linked lists, trees, and searching and sorting algorithms. Get ready to excel in coding interviews.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Build a solid foundation in data structures and their usage. You'll learn about arrays, stacks, queues, and linked lists. Practical examples and hands-on exercises will ensure you understand the core data structures essential for programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Learn object-oriented programming (OOP) principles using Python. This course covers classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation in Python. Enhance your coding skills with the power of OOP.

title: Software Engineering
details: Explore software development methodologies and best practices. You'll dive into the software development life cycle, version control, testing, and project management. Equip yourself with the knowledge to build high-quality software.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Discover Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. This course covers AWS services, infrastructure as code, security, and scalability. Prepare for a career in cloud technology with hands-on experience.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master MySQL database management and SQL queries. From database design to data manipulation, this course covers it all. Acquire the skills needed to work with relational databases effectively.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Explore various problem-solving techniques, algorithms, and strategies used in the world of computer science and programming.
